originalText.text: I'm so glad we found Juli to help us create more space in our apartment! Between some preexisting organizational challenges and preparing to have a baby, we were overwhelmed and accumulating stacks of boxes that we had no place to unload. I spoke to a few organizers and after talking to Juli, immediately felt that she would be a good fit. She was responsive, flexible, made helpful suggestions about what we could get rid of (without being pushy), guided us through what we could do between sessions, and was efficient and hands-on in freeing up space/unpacking boxes. It was well worth it and I'd highly recommend her services!

text.text: I'm so glad we found Juli to help us create more space in our apartment! It was well worth it and I'd highly recommend her services!

originalText.text: Juli is truly an artist. I am a musician who lives in a small studio apt. Between my instruments, sheet music (and general clutter) she has transformed my home into what feels spacious and organized beyond my wildest dreams. She also helped me get rid of my storage unit, which is a huge money saver each month. Her expertise is worth every penny.

She also helped me get rid of my storage unit, which is a huge money saver each month. Her expertise is worth every penny.

originalText.text: Juli was SO helpful in helping me de clutter and re organize my kitchen, dining room, and living room. She was efficient and professional and had great ideas and was super hands on. I look forward to using her again!

text.text: Juli was SO helpful in helping me de clutter and re organize my kitchen, dining room, and living room. She was efficient and professional and had great ideas and was super hands on. I look forward to using her again!

originalText.text:
I began working with Juli about 6 years ago, at the recommendation of a good friend, while I was pregnant and in the process of moving into a new home. In a matter of hours, Juli was able to help me to pare down and consider how to be more organized in an ongoing way. She was productive, practical and incredibly helpful.

I've maintained an ongoing relationship with Juli since then, to work on organizational projects such as archiving photos, making closets less cluttered and most recently to help us stage and sell our apartment and prepare for a cross country move.

Juli's expertise kept us on task and she was meticulous to every detail in helping to organize the move. She reduced our stress incredibly in managing these two projects! From researching companies, to acquiring a range of quotes, to booking and overseeing services, and communicating on our behalf with a range of vendors, she was with us every step of the way.

Juli is trustworthy, so smart and experienced and incredibly efficient. As I write this, I am thinking about how to fly her across the country to keep working with me! She is that great. I've worked with other organizers who just don't compare. It's Juli's ability to see to the end of a project and also remain focused on the steps in between that sets her apart. Juli is an absolute pleasure to work with!

originalText.text:
We began working with Juli about a year before our actual
move and from the moment she stepped foot into our
home and office she handled everything with such
incredible organization and efficiency. It was easy to tell
we made the right choice on who to hire for our move
across the country. From packing our home and office to
making sure every detail of which movers to choose Juli
made our lives easier and took a huge amount of stress
off our plates. She helped reduce the amount of things
we actually needed so when we got to our new home we
had less "stuff" to deal with which was also a huge relief.
We could not have done this without her and if we had to
do it all over again, I wouldn't think twice about calling Juli again.
